mapper.select: SELECT a.*, e.cd_nm AS career_nm, COALESCE(f.file_url, '') AS fileUrl, c.jr_gbn_cd, c.*, d.*, z.*, z.r_title as resumeTitle, DATEDIFF(a.e_dt, NOW()) AS `leftDt`, COUNT(g.l_no) AS scrapCnt, COUNT(h.l_no) AS bookmarkCnt FROM tbl_job_open a LEFT JOIN tbl_job_open_stack b ON a.j_no = b.j_no LEFT JOIN tbl_user d ON a.id = d.id LEFT JOIN tbl_codeinfo e ON a.career_cd = e.cd AND e.up_cd = 'career_cd' LEFT JOIN tbl_file f ON a.id = f.file_ref_id AND f.file_gbn_cd = 100 LEFT JOIN tbl_resume_job_open c ON a.j_no = c.j_no LEFT JOIN tbl_resume z ON c.r_no = z.r_no LEFT JOIN tbl_likes g ON a.j_no = g.cj_no AND g.l_gbn_cd = 'S' AND g.id = #{id} LEFT JOIN tbl_likes h ON a.id = h.cj_no AND h.l_gbn_cd = 'B' AND h.id = #{id} WHERE c.inst_id = #{id} AND a.del_yn = 'N' AND z.del_yn = 'N' GROUP BY c.jr_no LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit};

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_job_open a LEFT JOIN tbl_job_open_stack b ON a.j_no = b.j_no LEFT JOIN tbl_resume_job_open c ON a.j_no = c.j_no LEFT JOIN tbl_resume z ON c.r_no = z.r_no WHERE c.inst_id = #{id} AND a.del_yn = 'N' AND z.del_yn = 'N';
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_resume_job_open_star (j_no, r_no, jr_star, inst_id) values (#{rating.jNo}, #{rating.rNo}, #{rating.rating}, #{rating.id})
